import turtle
import math
turtle.title("ç…§å½»ä¹¾å¤ï¼Œå°é€å±±æ²³")
turtle.bgpic("yueliang/1.png")

p = turtle.Turtle()
p.pensize(4)
p.speed(3)

#åšæœˆé¥¼çš„é¢
def ellipse(a,b,n=500,c='#CD950C'):
    p.penup()
    p.setpos(a,0)

    color = p.color(c)
    p.pendown()

    for i in range(n):
        radian = 2 * math.pi /n
        theta = (i+1) * radian
        next_point = (a * math.cos(theta)),b * math.sin(theta)
        p.setpos(next_point)

ellipse(300,200,c='#CD950C')
ellipse(296,196,c='#FFB90F')
ellipse(292,192,c='#FFD700')

#åšæœˆé¥¼çš„åº•

turtle.goto(-10,-300)
turtle.color("#CD950C")
turtle.pensize(6)

turtle.circle(430,42)#33

turtle.goto(296,-40)
turtle.pendown()
turtle.right(54)
turtle.forward(151)
turtle.penup()
turtle.goto(0,0)
turtle.pendown()



def draw(a1,b1,a2,b2,f='#CD950C'):#è¾¹è§’çš„2ä¸ªç‚¹ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æ˜¯(a1,b1),(a2,b2)
    turtle.penup()
    turtle.goto(a1,b1)
    turtle.pensize(6)
    turtle.color(f)
    turtle.pendown()
    turtle.goto(a2,b1)
    turtle.goto(a2,b2)
    turtle.penup()
    return()

#ä¸‹é¢æ˜¯4ä¸ªè§’å›¾æ¡ˆ
draw(260,78,130,170,'#FFD700')
draw(250,90,150,160)
draw(240,102,172,150)
draw(230,114,194,140)

 turtle.begin_fill()

 turtle.left(180)
